Title: Relates to the maintenance, improvement and repair of certain town highways
Summary: Permits the designation of low volume roads and minimum maintenance roads by town boards and enacts provisions relating to the maintenance, improvement and repair of such roads.
LawCode: Add ยง205-c, Hway L; add ยง124, amd ยง1683, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the maintenance, improvement and repair of certain town highways
